title: AI Project Ideas
content: Create a voice-controlled smart home system that integrates with existing IoT devices and learns user preferences over time.

title: Meeting Notes - Team Sync
content: Discuss quarterly goals, assign tasks for the new AI agent project, and review progress on the voice recognition module.

title: Shopping List
content: Buy groceries: milk, bread, eggs, vegetables, and some snacks for the weekend coding session.

title: Learning Goals
content: Study advanced Python concepts, learn about machine learning algorithms, and practice building AI agents.

title: Reminder - Code Review
content: Remember to review the VoiceNoteAgent code before submitting the pull request and test all functionality thoroughly.
